In this chapter you will

* Learn how to install R and R Studio on your computer
* Get familiar with some core features of the R programming language
* Learn how to use R as a calculator 

To meet this chapter's learning objectives, please complete the respective exercise sheet. The instructions document provided below guides you though the process of solving the exercise sheet.
